title: Dragon Heir
description: There was a time when the mad king of the human world raged war between dragonriders, forcing their own queen and king to seal the portal between both worlds.Now, in a land full of turmoil, one huntress learns of her heritage and ability to solely harness her dragon's powers, giving the opportunity to save both lands.Will she be able to free the citizens from their tyrant leader and save her own people from extinction? Or will she fall prey to those wanting to use her powers for their own greed?
author: Gem Higa
